display_long_description:
**Ingredients Fly Through the Air, and AI Cooks Them!?**

All the player has to do is slice the ingredients with a sword. 

It's a super easy rhythm action game!


**Slice Ingredients Simultaneously! Freshness Up, Meow!**

If you slice three ingredients simultaneously with perfect timing, the quality of the dish will improve.


**Create One-of-a-Kind Dishes!**

The final dish varies each time based on the sliced ingredients, making it addictive. An image-generating AI using ChatGPT creates unique dishes.


**Share Your Finished Dishes on Social Media!**

Is the completed dish delicious-looking? Or perhaps a bit unusual and mysterious? 

Post it on social media and have fun with your friends and followers!

**Would you like to grab a sword and enjoy fantasy cooking with cats?**
[media]
[media]
[media]
